text: Borgato is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Agostino Borgato (1871–1939), Italian actor and film director *Francesco Borgato (born 1990), Italian singer and dancer *Giada Borgato (born 1989), Italian cyclist *Giovanni Borgato (1897–1975), Italian footballer *Luigi Borgato (born 1963), Italian piano maker Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Borgato
